title: Full-Stack AI Engineer
description: Building AI-powered conversational systems to help parents of neurodivergent children access resources, screening tools and support.

projects.name: AMAP: AI Healthcare Voice Agent
projects.summary: Voice-based AI agent helping parents based in the United States find resources for neurodivergent children via phone, SMS and web chat.
bullets: Built a phone-accessible AI system using Twilio, AWS, Anthropic Claude, and OpenAI to guide parents through complex resource navigation
Integrated location-aware search using AWS's RDS/Aurora PostgreSQL with PostGIS extensions, enabling geographic queries for nearby services
Implemented Redis caching to reduce API costs by 60% while maintaining sub-second response times for common queries
Architected conversation flow using state machines to handle multi-turn dialogues, clarifications, and fallback scenarios
Deployed scalable infrastructure on AWS with Lambda functions and API Gateway for serverless voice processing
Created a HIPAA-compliant architecture for the AI agent using AWS's services and the AWS Well-Architected Framework, ensuring low latency and high availability for the users using websockets
Designed a landing page for the AI agent using Next.js, React,Tailwind CSS and AWS's S3 and CloudFront services
Deployed endpoints made with Fastify, Node.js and Typescript for the AI agent using AWS's API Gateway and Lambda functions
Created a CI/CD pipeline using GitHub Actions and AWS's CodePipeline and CodeBuild services to deploy the AI agent and the landing page

achievements: Created accessible AI system reaching parents without internet access
Reduced resource discovery time from hours to minutes through conversational interface

title: Full-Stack AI Engineer
description: Developed AI-powered applications for entrepreneurs & startups, focusing on legal compliance automation and creative content generation.

projects.name: Formation: AI-Powered LLC Formation Platform
projects.summary: AI-powered platform automating LLC formation and compliance for entrepreneurs.
bullets: Built end-to-end LLC formation platform serving Spanish, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, and English-speaking markets, processing 500+ formations in first 6 months

Integrated AI-powered document generation using OpenAI and Puppeteer to create state-specific operating agreements and articles of organization, reducing the time to form an LLC from 15 minutes to 3 minutes
Designed multi-step onboarding flow with real-time validation, reducing formation errors by 85% and improving the user experience
Implemented automated compliance tracking system alerting users to annual report deadlines and state requirements
Created payment processing integration with Stripe for formation fees and ongoing compliance subscriptions
Deployed scalable infrastructure on AWS with Lambda functions and API Gateway for serverless document generation
Designed and implemented an Admin Dashboard using React to manage the users and the formations, taking advantage of the Redux Toolkit for state management and the React Query for data fetching
Integrated system notifications and alerts for each user action, using Slack and Webhooks, reducing the time to notify the users by 80% and improving the user experience

projects.name: Everbook: AI-Powered Illustrative Books Generator
projects.summary: Platform for creating personalized illustrated books using AI, allowing users to generate books with AI-written stories and AI-generated illustrations, with the ability to customize the book's style, characters, and settings.
bullets: Developed full-stack application generating custom books with AI-written stories and AI-generated illustrations, with the ability to customize the book's style, characters, and settings
Integrated OpenAI GPT-4 for story generation and DALL-E for illustration creation, maintaining narrative consistency across pages
Built interactive book editor allowing users to refine stories, regenerate specific pages, and customize visual styles
Implemented PDF generation pipeline converting digital books to print-ready formats with proper pagination and bleed
Optimized image generation workflow reducing average book creation time from 15 minutes to under 3 minutes
Worked with SQS and Lambda functions to handle the book generation workflow, reducing the time to generate a book by 80% and improving the user experience
Deployed scalable infrastructure on AWS with Lambda functions and API Gateway for serverless document generation
Provided support for over 6 languages using the i18next library and the Next.js i18n module, as well as hand-coded scripts to translate the content to the other languages using OpenAI's API

achievements: Delivered two production AI applications serving thousands of users
Reduced formation completion time by 75% compared to traditional methods

title: Full-Stack Web3 Developer
description: Built and maintained three core products in the ARK ecosystem, focusing on user-friendly Web3 wallet experiences for web and browser extensions, as well as a multi-chain wallet dashboard.

projects.name: ARKVault: Web Wallet Manager
projects.summary: Custom web-based wallet for ARK Core blockchains with Ledger hardware support.
bullets: Reduced deployment time by 30% through CI/CD pipeline refactoring and automated testing implementation
Built multi-profile wallet management allowing users to organize addresses by purpose (personal, business, cold storage)
Implemented real-time transaction status tracking distinguishing between pending, confirmed, and failed states
Created reusable React hooks centralizing transaction logic, reducing code duplication by 40% across wallet products
Integrated Ledger hardware wallet support for secure transaction signing without exposing private keys
Refactored the entire frontend codebase to use the new React 19 features, reducing the bundle size by 30% and improving the performance by 50%
Worked on over 200 functionalities implemented in the platform, including: transaction management, vote feature, profile configuration, dark mode, and more
Coded over 400 unit tests using Vitest and React Testing Library, catching regressions before production releases

projects.name: ARKWallet: Web3 Wallet Extension
projects.summary: Chrome and Firefox crypto wallet extension with HD wallet derivation and multi-network support.
bullets: Designed and shipped a browser extension for Chrome and Firefox supporting secure onboarding and BIP44 HD wallet derivation, allowing users to manage their assets and transactions securely
Built transaction signing flows using ARK SDKs with clear confirmation screens for non-technical users
Implemented network selection allowing users to switch between mainnet, devnet, and custom ARK networks
Created secure storage layer for encrypted private keys using browser extension APIs and best practices
Collaborated with designers on send/receive flows ensuring safety without requiring blockchain knowledge

projects.name: Dashbrd: NFT Portfolio Dashboard
projects.summary: Multi-chain wallet supporting Polygon and Ethereum with NFT gallery features.
bullets: Developed portfolio dashboard integrating with Alchemy and Moralis APIs for real-time balance and transaction data
Built NFT discovery and gallery features allowing users to showcase collections with interactive displays
Migrated styling from Styled Components to Tailwind CSS, improving consistency and reducing bundle size by 25%
Implemented PHP/Laravel endpoints connecting ARK infrastructure with third-party blockchain APIs
Added unit tests around critical wallet flows catching regressions before production releases

projects.name: ARKConnect: Web3 Connection Extension
projects.summary: Open-source browser extension connecting ARK addresses to Web3 applications, similar to MetaMask.
bullets: Built browser extension enabling dApp connectivity for ARK ecosystem similar to MetaMask
Implemented secure message signing and transaction approval flows for Web3 interactions
Created consistent design language across all ARK products maintaining brand identity

achievements: Shipped 4 production crypto products serving thousands of daily users
Reduced deployment time by 30% through CI/CD improvements
Cut frontend bundle size by 25% through architectural improvements
Developed 2 production browser extensions serving thousands of daily users

title: Full-Stack Web3 Developer
description: Led complete frontend modernization and built real-time blockchain integration for decentralized betting platform on Solana, as well as a web3 wallet extension for the platform.

projects.name: Divvy Bet: Web3 Decentralized Betting Platform
projects.summary: Web3 sports betting application on Solana blockchain with wallet integration, allowing users to place bets on sports events
bullets: Refactored 100% of frontend repositories reducing file size by 40% and cutting deployment time by 20%
Worked on the SDK for the platform, allowing users to place bets on sports events
Updated the smart contracts for the platform, allowing users to place bets on sports events
Reduced security vulnerabilities by 70% through dependency updates and security best practices
Modernized tech stack implementing TypeScript, Next.js, Redux, React Query, TailwindCSS, and Styled Components
Built real-time blockchain endpoints communicating with Solana network for live bet placement and settlement
Implemented geo-IP services, 2FA, and multi-layer security using AWS protecting user funds and data
Created the entire frontend for the platform, including the landing page, the betting page, the account page, the profile page, and the settings page
Implemented parlays, teasers, and other betting options for the platform

achievements: Reduced deployment time by 20% while cutting repository size by 40%
Decreased security vulnerabilities by 70% through systematic refactoring

title: Senior Frontend Developer
description: Led 6-person frontend team through complete tech stack modernization while building AI-powered talent acquisition product, as well as a hiring, screening and onboarding platform for the company

projects.name: Advise: AI Talent Acquisition
projects.summary: AI-powered platform predicting hiring process performance and outcomes.
bullets: Designed and built company's third product from scratch, increasing talent acquisition prediction accuracy by 30%
Developed interactive dashboards with real-time statistical analysis for recruitment pipeline optimization
Led 6-person frontend team implementing modern stack across 4 company platforms with mentoring and training
Increased test coverage by 80% using Jest and React Testing Library, catching critical bugs before production

projects.name: Hiring & Onboarding Platform
projects.summary: High-volume recruitment workflows serving major enterprise clients.
bullets: Built features processing millions of hourly worker applications for clients like Amazon and Grubhub
Refactored frontend repositories to TypeScript, Next.js, TailwindCSS, Redux, and Apollo/GraphQL
Implemented CI/CD flow connecting 10+ repositories with Heroku and cloud services
Developed GraphQL data fetching simplifying complex API integrations across multiple services

achievements: Increased prediction accuracy by 30% for talent acquisition processes
Led team of 6 through successful tech stack migration
Increased test coverage by 80% across all repositories

title: Founder & CEO
description: Founded and scaled edtech platform training 10,000+ teachers across 6 Latin American countries during the pandemic.

projects.name: Teacher Training Platform
projects.summary: Scalable e-learning platform with adaptive teaching model and AI chatbot.
bullets: Trained 10,000+ teachers across 6 Latin American countries during pandemic school closures
Built scalable 4-tier cloud architecture supporting 5,000+ simultaneous users using AWS (EC2, S3, RDS)
Programmed AI chatbot reducing response times by 90% and increasing revenue by 150%
Implemented adaptive teaching model with AI/ML enabling 24/7 asynchronous learning
Recorded, edited, and produced 300+ virtual classes for remote teacher training
Led full product lifecycle from planning and design through development and deployment

achievements: Reached 6 countries across Latin America
Trained 10,000+ teachers during pandemic
Reduced support response time by 90% with AI chatbot
Increased revenue by 150% through automation

title: Founder & Principal Software Engineer
description: Built platform coordinating vaccine tourism during COVID-19, managing travel, appointments, and lodging for 300+ international travelers.

projects.name: Vaccine Travel Coordination Platform
projects.summary: End-to-end travel and health compliance system for COVID-era vaccine tourism.
bullets: Designed 3-tier cloud architecture on AWS supporting 3,000+ simultaneous users across Peru
Developed full-stack platform coordinating flights, vaccine appointments, and lodging for international travelers
Implemented AI monitoring system tracking 300+ patients and platform users
Built virtual telephone exchange system enabling 10+ person team to coordinate complex travel logistics
Increased test coverage by 85% across all repositories ensuring reliable health-critical operations

achievements: Served 300+ international travelers during pandemic
Built scalable system supporting 3,000+ simultaneous users
Increased test coverage by 85%
Interviewed at US and Peruvian news on TV and radio

title: Software Engineer
description: Increased company revenue by 200% implementing software services and building multiple production systems for diverse clients.

projects.summary: Travel booking and inventory management system with third-party API integrations.
bullets: Built travel operations platform handling bookings, inventory, and customer workflows during tourism reactivation
Integrated multiple travel APIs connecting with third-party providers for flights, hotels, and packages
Developed on Laravel/PHP backend with React frontend and MySQL database on AWS infrastructure

projects.summary: MOOC marketplace and automated customer support system for a teaching platform with chatbot automation and document processing.
bullets: Developed automated customer support system with chatbot automation and document processing
Built chatbot support flows answering common questions and reducing support ticket volume
Implemented document upload and chunking flow enabling knowledge base creation from files
Created a MOOC marketplace for teachers to sell their courses, as well as a platform for students to learn from the courses

bullets: Developed and improved web pages optimizing user experience for marketing campaigns
Implemented performance and SEO improvements increasing organic traffic and conversion rates
Built with modern JavaScript, TypeScript, React, and TailwindCSS stack

projects.summary: Multi-platform ticketing system for Latin American market.
bullets: Built event creation and ticket purchasing flows serving Latin American event market
Integrated payment providers enabling secure ticket transactions
Developed ticket validation tools for event staff to verify attendees on-site
Designed 3-tier AWS architecture (EC2, S3, RDS) supporting planned iOS and Android apps

achievements: Increased company revenue by 200% through software services
Delivered 5+ production systems for diverse clients
Improved internal communication speed by 40% with cloud infrastructure

description: Built 20+ web systems for 15+ clients, progressing from basic stacks to advanced frameworks while establishing foundation in software engineering principles.
